amendatorysection.catchline: Repealed. Laws 2014, LB749, § 298. Operative date January 1, 2016. Articles of incorporation; effect of amendment.
amendatorysection.para: An amendment to articles of incorporation shall not affect a cause of action existing against or in favor of the corporation, a proceeding to which the corporation is a party, or the existing rights of persons other than shareholders of the corporation. An amendment changing a corporation's name shall not abate a proceeding brought by or against the corporation in its former name.
